title: Chickpeas, spinach and cashew salad
description: A nutritious mix of chickpeas, iron-rich spinach and creamy cashews make this spiced salad recipe by Dale Pinnock a healthy lunch or dinner.
ingredients: 2 x 400g tins chickpeas, drained and rinsed
2 tbsp desiccated coconut, toasted in a dry pan until golden

method.Step 1: Heat a little olive oil in a pan, add the onions and garlic and fry for 4-5 minutes or until softened. Stir in the baby spinach and cook until it wilts.

method.Step 2: Add the chickpeas, cashew nuts, goji berries and cumin, then cook for another 3 minutes. Season to taste.

method.Step 3: Sprinkle over the toasted coconut, stir well and serve. It’s great served with a salad or sautéed green veg.
